work.name: Sinexcel Electric Co., Ltd, Shenzhen, China
work.summary: Worked on DSP software development and optimization for charging modules of EV charging piles
highlights: Maintained and optimized PFC-side code for 1000V/20kW and 1000V/40kW charging modules, improving system stability and functionality.
Led the migration of PFC-side code to a new chip, integrating CLA code to enhance performance and control precision.

awards.title: Provincial First Prize

awards.summary: Developed a mobile application using the principle of infrared diffuse reflection to non-destructively measure the apple Brix level. Won the first prize at the provincial level.
